Package ncochran.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddEdgeController
    The AddEdgeController is a MouseListener used to add a valid Edge to the Decision Lines Event at the location a user releases their mouse.
    ChoiceController
    This class handles setting valid Choices based upon User input via text fields.
    ConsoleController
    This class is used to get the number of Choices and number of Rounds from the User through the console.
    StartButtonController
    This class monitors the Start button and when pressed, allows the User to begin adding Edges and disables the ability to change the Choices.
    TestAddEdgeController
    This Class is used to test the AddEdgeController class.
    TestChoiceController
    This class is used to test the ChoiceController.
    TestConsoleController
    This class is used to test the ConsoleController.
    TestStartButtonController
    This class is used to test the StartButtonController.
